text: Agripina Prima Rahmanto Putra also known as Agripina Prima Rahmanto Pamungkas (born 20 January 1991) is an Indonesian male badminton player from Jaya Raya Jakarta badminton club. He elected to join the national team in 2010. ==Personal life== He is the son of the former Indonesian badminton player Sigit Pamungkas. He graduated at the Montfort Secondary School in Singapore. == Achievements == === BWF Grand Prix === The BWF Grand Prix has two level such as Grand Prix and Grand Prix Gold. It is a series of badminton tournaments, sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007.
